MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G78 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Braeside Drive and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am due to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10:30 AM on Monday, 18 January 2021.
